title: Continuously hardening ChatGPT Atlas against prompt injection
optimized_headline: "Strengthening ChatGPT Atlas: New Strategies to Combat Prompt Injection"
raw_excerpt: OpenAI is strengthening ChatGPT Atlas against prompt injection attacks using automated red teaming trained with reinforcement learning. This proactive discover-and-patch loop helps identify novel exploits early and harden the browser agent’s defenses as AI becomes more agentic.
